ggit.utils package¶

ggit.utils.folder_utils¶

ggit.utils.folder_utils.walk_objects(repository) → List[pathlib.Path]¶

Walk the repository .git/objects folder and returns all objects found. The objects are returned as a list of Path objects.

Parameters

repository (str) – The repository to walk.

Returns

The list of Path objects of the git objects found.

Return type

List[Path]
